channel.title: Gitch in Lambda Core, cannot throw pump #1 switch
channel.description:
Here's the status and getpos information: [code] ] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c3a2e at: 310 x, 2328 y, 840 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 3 "bknight1983" UNKNOWN 00:52 18 0 active loopback ] getpos setpos 310.548157 2328.871094 840.031250;setang 13.052822 -175.397552 0.000000 [/code]
As well as a screenshot![bm_c3a2e0000.jpg|690x500](upload://iyMIfas888PlPwhJ18MEscCIREP.jpeg)
I was trying to switch it from OFF to ON but nothing happens. I hear the "invalid grab" sound when hitting the interact button. Let me know if you need more information or if I should file this in the community bug tracker

item.title: Gitch in Lambda Core, cannot throw pump #1 switch
item.dc:creator: bknight1983
item.description:
Sorry about that, that’s a fail on me

Read full topic
item.source: Gitch in Lambda Core, cannot throw pump #1 switch

item.title: Gitch in Lambda Core, cannot throw pump #1 switch
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Not a bug, go jump in the coolant by pump #1 and push the button at the bottom to release the emergence drain cap.
Then throw the pump on switch.

Hate it when people report bugs that don’t exist.

Read full topic
item.source: Gitch in Lambda Core, cannot throw pump #1 switch
